text: Mo a yama mo Nyamesom ho Nwoma, monhwε yie na moanyε (nneεma bi) amma no antra so wͻ mo Nyamesom no mu; na monhwε na moanka biribi anto Nyakopͻn so, na mmom (monka) deε εyε nokorε. Yesu Kristo, Mar’yam ba no, ͻyε Onyankopͻn Somafoͻ ne N’asεm a Ɔto maa Mar’yam, ne honhom a efiri Nehͻ. Enti monye Nyankopͻn ne N’asomafoͻ no ni. Monhwε na moanka sε: (Anyame) Mmiεnsa.
